overview: Have you been Deceived? Brandon Lee is in the midst of a hot afternoon sex session with blond bottom boy Jeremy Jordan. They are so turned on by the video they are watching with Jan Fischer and Patrick Downs that they just can't keep their clothes on. Right in the middle of the action, Claudio Martin pulls up on his motorcycle to deliver a pizza. Turns out that pizza wasn't what the boys ordered, but Claudio was just what they needed on their menu.
title: Deceived
